description: CROPSR is a python tool designed for genome-wide gRNA design and evaluation for CRISPR experiments, with special focus on complex genomes such as those found in energy-producing crops. CROPSR is a product of the DOE Center for Advanced Bioenergy and Bioproducts Innovation (CABBI).
name: CROPSR: An Automated Platform for Complex Genome-Wide CRISPR gRNA Design and Validation
